name: my-static-generated-nunjucks-site
description: Static website for hair by cher, Amsterdam.

scripts.prebuild: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: chokidar '**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-js' --ignore 'dist/**/*.js' --ignore 'src/helpers/**/*'  --ignore 'node_modules/.cache/**/*' & chokidar '**/*.html' -c 'npm run build-html' --ignore 'dist/**/*.html' & chokidar '**/*.scss' -c 'npm run build-css' & chokidar 'src/assets/fonts/*' -c 'npm run move-fonts' --throttle 5000 & chokidar 'src/assets/images/*' -c 'npm run move-images' --throttle 5000

author: Gijs Laarman
